problems_addressed.solution_summary: Utilize New Western's podium program to submit properties and receive cash offers within 24 hours.
New Western commits to a 2% referral fee regardless of seller agreement.
Leverage New Western's local agents for in-person evaluations and cash offers.

target_avatars.relevance: Intermediate agents can expand their service offerings by partnering with New Western for distressed properties.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: You don't need to be an expert in investments to benefit from distressed property opportunities.

target_avatars.relevance: Top producers can increase revenue streams by tapping into the distressed property market.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Strategically targeting distressed properties can significantly boost your income.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: We buy a house every 13 minutes.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Highlights the scale and efficiency of New Western's operations.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Ever wondered how often investment firms buy homes? Here's a surprising stat!

clip_worthy_moments.quote: You don't have to become an expert in real estate investment. You just have to see a house that you want to sell that would be really hard to list.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to explore investment opportunities without needing deep expertise.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Think you need to be an investment expert to sell distressed properties? Think again!

key_tactics.tactic: Submit distressed properties to New Western's podium program for quick cash offers.
key_tactics.context: When encountering properties that are difficult to list traditionally.

key_tactics.tactic: Target older neighborhoods for potential distressed property opportunities.
key_tactics.context: Focus on areas with aging populations and outdated homes.

quotable_insights: Our investors love adding value to communities by transforming distressed properties.

resources_mentioned.name: sell to newwestern.com
resources_mentioned.context: Platform for agents to submit distressed properties and learn about partnership opportunities.

episode_summary: In this episode, Kurt Byers from New Western discusses how real estate agents can leverage the company's podium program to handle distressed properties efficiently. By partnering with New Western, agents can receive quick cash offers and earn referral fees, providing a solution to the challenges of listing difficult properties. The episode highlights strategies for identifying opportunities in the distressed property market and emphasizes the importance of local agent partnerships.
